com.google.code.rees.scope.util.thread
Class BasicTaskThread

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.rees.scope.util.thread.AbstractEasyThread
      com.google.code.rees.scope.util.thread.BasicTaskThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
EasyThread, TaskThread
public class BasicTaskThread
extends AbstractEasyThread
implements TaskThread

A basic TaskThread implementation that uses a CopyOnWriteArraySet to manage concurrent read/write/removal of ThreadTasks.

Author:
rees.byars

destroy

public void destroy()
Safely stops and destroys the underlying thread. For the purposes of safety, the underlying thread cannot be guaranteed to completely, immediately cease, but it will be stopped as soon as possible in a safe manner.

Specified by:
